before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"9nn01","text":"Prepare stock solutions: 10X Stock solutions can be made ahead of time and are shelf stable at   for 1 month; 1X solutions must be made fresh","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":95,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"50gc3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1nph","text":"10X ACSF","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bum8r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bj6vh","text":"10X Cutting Solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3unb7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9CF4DD7057D011ECAECC3DE0D09831B4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3vj3j","text":"This protocol describes the steps for preparing acute brain slices.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_collections.title: Nielsen and Ford (2023) M4-mediated cholinergic transmission is reduced in parkinsonian mice and its restoration alleviates motor deficits and levodopa-induced dyskinesia

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4fj34","text":"Set up vibratome","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tuqq","text":"Carefully clean blade with ethanol and water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4b6db","text":"Using a hex wrench, insert blade in blade holder assembly","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"et3o8","text":"Run VibroCheck calibration","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcpat","text":"Place buffer tray in ice tray and fill ice tray with ice; load on to vibratome","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2d9cq","text":"Superglue a rectangular piece (~2 cm x 1 cm x 1 cm) of 3% agar onto the specimen plate ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4321","text":"Dissect brain and glue it to specimen plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"751h6","text":"Insert plate in buffer tray and fill tray with 1X cutting solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
